MefQuoteItem.description: A quote items describe an action to be performed on a productOffering or a product in order to get pricing elements and condition.

subjectToFeasibilityCheck.description: For a Firm Quote Level indicates if the pricing requires a Feasibility Check. The Seller indicates if the Quote Item requires a Feasibility Check.  This is not used for a Budgetary Quote Level.

quoteItemInstallationInterval.description: Quote Item Installation Interval that the Seller can commit to.

quoteItemTerm.description: Quote Item Term that the Seller can commit to.

state.description: Possible values for the status of a QuoteItem.

terminationError.description: When the Seller cannot process the Quote Item Request, the Seller returns a text-based list of reasons here. If the `QuoteItem.state=rejected.insufficientInformationProvided`, the Seller MUST specify the `terminationError` attribute.
